body.name: Fujifilm Instax Square SQ40 Instant Camera
body.stockDetail: Only 9 left in stock - order soon.
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Square, sophisticated design with black textured finish. Simply twist to turn on and off
Built-in Automatic exposure, for ideal photos every time
Built-in one-touch selfie lens and selfie mirror
Prints high-quality, 3.39” x 2.83” INSTAX SQUARE instant photos (INSTAX SQUARE instant film sold separately)
Includes: Hand strap, user manual, (2) CR2 batteries and 1-year limited warranty
body.description: Spark unique moments of creativity with the INSTAX SQUARE SQ40™ instant camera – a chic instant camera that looks as good as it shoots. That’s right, it’s got a sophisticated black textured finish that’ll go with any style. And it’s remarkably easy to operate, helping you capture beautiful INSTAX SQUARE instant photos, every time. In fact, when it came to designing the square silhouette, we had only the boldest in mind. We added the feel of analog photography to bring you a timeless look that’ll only enhance your unique flair. Plus, by making the INSTAX SQUARE SQ40 camera wonderfully versatile, it’s always ready for all your creative moments. Simply twist to turn on, twist to enter Selfie mode and twist to turn off. And with automatic exposure, expressing your creativity really couldn’t be easier; whether you’re behind the camera or framing yourself in the selfie mirror ready for a close-up. Just point and shoot and let the INSTAX SQUARE SQ40 camera do the rest! INSTAX SQUARE instant film sold separately.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Capture the True You Spark unique moments of creativity with the INSTAX SQUARE SQ40 instant camera – a chic instant camera that looks as good as it shoots.

Style & Smile SELFIE MODE Put yourself in the moment, as it happens, with the INSTAX SQUARE SQ40 instant camera. Rotate the lens to Selfie mode, then flip the camera to frame yourself in the selfie mirror, and you’re ready to capture the true you. Because let’s face it, sometimes it’s fun to be the center of attention.

Remarkably easy SIMPLE CONTROLS It’s all in the twist. Twist to turn on. Twist to enter Selfie mode. Twist to turn off. Nothing more complicated, nothing to stand in the way of capturing that shot before the moment passes. The INSTAX SQUARE SQ40 instant camera is wonderfully versatile, always ready for all your creative moments.

Timeless looks CLASSIC DESIGN Designed with the boldest in mind, the INSTAX SQUARE SQ40 camera’s square silhouette and classic black finish goes with any look. In fact, with its textured and sophisticated finish, and all the feel of analog photography, we may even be bold enough to say it’ll enhance your unique style.

Light work AUTOMATIC EXPOSURE See that? Beautifully exposed INSTAX SQUARE instant photos every time. Featuring automatic exposure, expressing your creativity couldn’t be easier, just point and shoot, and let your INSTAX SQUARE SQ40 camera do the rest. INSTAX SQUARE instant film sold separately.

Scan. Collect. Share. INSTAXUP! App Just when you thought INSTAX products couldn’t get any more captivating, we give you the power of the INSTAXUP! App. A new way to keep all your INSTAX photos digitally in one place. Download the free App and simply scan your physical INSTAX instant photos with your Smartphone to turn them into sharable, digital photos that you edit, tag, and save.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a fun camera!
reviews.reviewText: We bought this camera to use for our wedding guestbook and it did not disappoint! Our friends and family had a blast taking pictures for the book! The flash worked to help with lose late night photos and we ended up with a guestbook we’ll never forget!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cool photos. Family fun!
reviews.reviewText: This is just as fun as polaroids back in the day. The teenagers love the retro style of the photos. Because you shoot so close, you get super fun close ups. After the holidays we have a pile of great family photos. Highly recommended. The whole point of these is retro so the photo quality will reflect that.

reviews.reviewerName: Item was ripped. Only one but still sucked
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We use it all the time. Still learning how to use it but it’s loads of fun

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's almost unbelievable that a HALF CENTURY after the original Polaroid pics came out, the quality is just as poor. Plus these pics are considerably smaller that the originals from the 70's. Cannot recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good. Super fun.
reviews.reviewText: It’s what it says it is - a truly fun, modern-looking camera. Easy to use. I love the square prints - very retro vibe, and looks to be good quality (for an instant - you should know what type of prints you are getting.)I really thought these new instant cameras would be able to re-print a photo. I was wrong. Maybe I just don’t understand how these work - this is not reflected in my rating. Just a wish.Pros:Cool styling and good buildCool printsEasy to usePortableCons:Seems a digital device like this should be able to re-print photosBase order does not come with filmFilm is rather expensiveThe viewfinder is a bit tough to use with its placement - but does the job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Terrible setup experience
reviews.reviewText: I exchanged to this camera from another and will be returning this. The instructions don’t even tell you how to turn on the camera. The batteries have been loaded correctly and I have a flashing light. The only result from the troubleshooting: “an error has occurred”. Not one solution on what may be going wrong. The QR code in the instruction booklet led me to a page that said “error. This page could not be found”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not the picture quality I was expecting
reviews.reviewText: The pictures were so blurry - nothing was sharp - just know that about the pictures. If you like that - then get this camera as it was easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The picture quality has not improved since the 70’s.
